item.title: 1. Methodologies
item.description: Methodologies # There are dozens of performance tools for Linux Packages: sysstat, procps, coreutils, … Commercial products Methodologies can provide guidance for choosing and using tools effectively, by giving you a starting point, a process, and an ending point in your diagnotics. Problem Statement Method # What makes you think there is a performance problem? Has this system ever performed well? What has changed recently? (Software? Hardware? Load?) Can the performance degradation be expressed in terms of latency or run time?
